snippet: The sitcom began with hugely promising ratings that have declined; on Tuesday, the rating dropped almost 20 percent from just a week ago, hitting what is by far the low point for the new series.
abstract: The sitcom began with hugely promising ratings that have declined; on Tuesday, the rating dropped almost 20 percent from just a week ago, hitting what is by far the low point for the new series.

headline.main: 'New Girl' on Fox Is Latest Victim of a Disappearing TV Audience
